page.title: 11RESIDENTIAL SURVEY
page.content: From a residential survey of every fifth house we discovered that the majority of residents are aged over sixty.Very few people are aged between nineteen and thirty although there are a considerable number of children and teenagers.We think the numbers of elderly people are probably due to the fact that there is little opportunity for employment except in the summer season,so unless people are prepared to travel or are self employed they do not move into this area.Another factor may be that the sea air is relaxing and beneficial to health for the elderly.Most of the residential homes are detached or semi-detached houses and bungalows with few terraced houses or flats.
